solution_line_template: Violet has {violet_total_nails}-{more_than_twice} = <<{violet_total_nails}-{more_than_twice}={violet_nails_twice_tickletoe}>>{violet_nails_twice_tickletoe} nails, twice the number of nails that Tickletoe has.
Together, Tickletoe and Violet have {tickletoe_nails}+{violet_total_nails} = <<{tickletoe_nails}+{violet_total_nails}={total_nails}>>{total_nails} nails
